blogPost.excerpt: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
blogPost.body: Sometimes words just aren't enough... on Monet, send a drawing to make a new connection. :~)
blogPost.title: Monet - Draw your way to love, to friends, and to a good time.
blogPost.author: Jonathan Xue

localize.description: 有时候光靠语言是不够的……在Monet上，发送绘图以建立新连接。：~)
localize.tagline: 画出你通往爱情、朋友和快乐时光的道路。

localize.description: 有時候光靠語言是不夠的……在Monet上，發送繪圖以建立新連接。：~)
localize.tagline: 畫出你通往愛情、朋友和快樂時光的道路。

previous.title:
Mark Cuban Tells WallStreetBets to Hold ‘If You Can Afford to’

Idiot advice

localize.full_text:
马克-库班告诉WallStreetBets，"如果你能负担得起，就持有"。

白痴建议

馬克-庫班告訴WallStreetBets，"如果你能負擔得起，就持有"。

白癡建議

next.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
next.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。
